message: Let's start with a fair split, 60-40 in my favor.
You're starting with a 60-40 split? I'll meet you halfway at 55-45.
I'll give you 55, but I want 45.5
I'll give you 58, but I need 42 to feel comfortable.
You're being a bit more generous, but I'm still not sold on 42. I'll meet you at 50-50, but I'll throw in a slight favor to you: 49.5-50.5
You're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'll take the 49.5-50.5 split.
